property.value: Active. Web-Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sync Ratio — Resource: Exhaust an [Interface] upgrade you control â†’ generate that upgrade's resources.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "We're called SP//dr, and we protect the city."

property.name: Attribute
property.value: Inactive. Tech.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. This card's printed text box cannot be treated as if it were blank.Return to Base — Forced Interrupt: When you flip to this side, flip SP//dr to Peni Parker. Detach Peni Parker from here, moving all counters on her and cards attached to her to this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Psychogenetic Compatibility — Setup: Put SP//dr Suit into play, [Inactive] side faceup.Maintenance — Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust SP//dr Suit â†’ draw 2 cards.

property.name: Attribute
property.value: Interface. Pilot.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent. This card's printed text box cannot be treated as if it were blank.Suit Up! — Forced Interrupt: When you flip to this side, flip SP//dr Suit to its [Active] side. Attach this card to SP//dr Suit, moving all counters on this cards or cards attached to this card to SP//dr Suit.

property.name: Text
property.value: [star] VEN#m gets +1 THW and +1 ATK for each sym counter on her.Hero Response: After VEN#m enters play, place 1 sym counter on her for each resource generated by SP//dr Suit's "Sync Ratio" ability to pay for her.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hero Action: Choose:- Ready each [Interface] upgrade you control.- Search your deck and discard pile for an [Interface] upgrade and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If you paid for this card using a resource generated by SP//dr Suit's "Sync Ratio" ability, remove 3 threat from a scheme.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "We'll protect this city, no matter what." —SP//dr

property.name: Text
property.value: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a resource generated by SP//dr Suit's "Sync Ratio" ability, stun that enemy.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "May wanted SP//dr to be better, to be the best we could. That's why she developed these web-traps!"

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Aunt May & Uncle Ben and discard the top 2 cards of your deck (top 3 cards instead if you are in alter-ego form) â†’ add each SP//dr card discarded this way to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hero Action: Discard Ejection Protocol â†’ exhaust each [Interface] upgrade you control, set your hit point dial to 6, give your identity a tough status card, and flip to alter-ego form.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "Warning! Incomeing threat!"

property.name: Text
property.value: Hero Action: Exhaust SP//dr Command and an [Interface] upgrade â†’ draw 1 card.Hero Action: Exhaust SP//dr Command, choose and discard 1 card from your hand â†’ ready an [Interface] upgrade.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "Peni, listen to our orders very carefully."

property.name: Attribute
property.value: Interface. Spider.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hero Action: Exhaust Host Spider â†’ ready SP//dr Suit.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "He trusts you… so will I." —Peni Parker

property.name: Attribute
property.value: Interface. Tech.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hero Interrupt: When SP//dr Suit makes a basic thwart, exhaust Psychic Link â†’ it gets +2 THW for that thwart.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "Can we listen to music? It helps us focus." —Peni Parker

property.name: Attribute
property.value: Interface. Tech.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hero Interrupt: When SP//dr Suit defends against an attack, exhaust Speed-Metal Alloy â†’ it gets +2 DEF for that defense.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "I thought you said it was a suit—this is speed-metal!" —Spider-Ham

property.name: Attribute
property.value: Interface. Tech.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hero Interrupt: When SP/dr Suit makes a basic attack, exhaust Web-Fluid Compressor â†’ it gets +2 ATK for that attack.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "Progress takes patience. That's why we have to keep working on it." —Aunt May

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Daredevil defends against an attack, move 1 damage from him to the attacking enemy.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "Quiet breaks, shatters down, so the city reaches out. Listening… Waiting… Another station for a signal, and we're all some kind of noise. Be the good kind, Peni."

property.name: Text
property.value: X is equal to the number of facedown cards attached to Spider-Man Noir.Response: After you resolve a treachery, if you control another [Web-Warrior] card, attach that treachery facedown here (to a maximum of 3).

property.name: Text
property.value: Hero Action: Discard a [Tech] upgrade you control â†’ ready your hero and choose THW, ATK, or DEF. Until the end of the round, your hero gets +X to the chosen power, where X is equal to that upgrade's printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hero Action: Deal 1 damage to a [Web-Warrior] character you control â†’ place a total of 2 stun status cards on up to 2 enemies.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "You now have the entire afternoon to reconsider your life choices. You're welcome." —Spider-Man

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (6 energy counters). Max 1 per player.Forced Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, remove that many energy counters from here. For each energy counter removed this way, prevent 1 of that damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you would reveal an encounter card, deal 1 damage to a [Web-Warrior] character you control â†’ if that card is a treachery, cancel its "When Revealed" effects and discard Spider-Tingle.

property.name: Attribute
property.value: Cartoon. Web-Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a [Web-Warrior] card.[star]Forced Response: After Spider-Ham attacks of thwarts, discard the top card of the encounter deck. For each boost icon ([boost]) discarded this way, deal 1 damage to Spider-Ham.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control a [Web-Warrior] card.Response: After you play Spider-Man from your hand, ready an upgrade you control. If that upgrade has the [Tech] trait, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if your identity has at least 14 printed hit points.Hero Action: Ready your hero.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "What, you think this fight is almost over?! That was just warm-up practice." —Thor

property.name: Attribute
property.value: Condition. Superpower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if your identity has at least 14 printed hit points.Your identity gains steady.

property.name: Text
property.value: <b><i>Give to the Peni Parker player.<i><b>You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:- Exhaust Peni Parker â†’ remove Inherited Burden from the game.- Choose and discard 1 [Interface] upgrade you control. Discard this obligation.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to thwart this scheme, you must spend a [energy] resource.

property.name: Quote
property.value: M.O.R.B.I.U.S. is laying siege to the city, wreaking havoc and siphoning energy from its power grid.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Response: After the engaged hero generates any number of resources, deal an equal amount of damage to that hero.(SP//dr's nemesis minion.)

property.name: Quote
property.value: "This is a threat unlike any you've faced before!" —Uncle Ben

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Choose to either spend [energy][energy] resources or exhaust your identity.When Revealed (Hero): Choose to either spend [energy][energy] or take 3 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a friendly character. Max 1 per character.Hero Resource: Exhaust this card and deal 1 damage to attached character â†’ generate a [wild] resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme while a [Criminal] minion is in play.

property.name: Quote
property.value: The Iron Spider's Sinister Six are on an crime spree, robbing every business they come across.

property.name: Text
property.value: [star] Electro gets +1 hit point for each [energy] resource attached to her.[star] Forced Response: After Electro engages you or activates against you, choose 1 card from your hand with a printed [energy] resource and attach it to her.

property.name: Attribute
property.value: Criminal. Elite.

property.name: Text
property.value: Guard. Patrol. Retaliate 1. Toughness.

property.name: Quote
property.value: "Don't make me whoop you."

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Response: After Sandman takes any amount of damage from an attack, discard the top 7 cards of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Defeated: If Spot was defeated without excess damage, shuffle him into the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Surge.Each [Criminal] minion gains surge.Hero Action: If there are no [Criminal] minions in play, spend 2 resources of any type â†’ discard this card.
